name: Bondee's Barnyard: Safety Violation
summary:
The year is 2004, from inside the cow animatronic, Kou, you must defend yourself from a barrage of haywired animatronic characters.

And if that wasn't enough, you must avoid the camera systems sightline to not awake any suspicion with the security guard. If you're seen moving around, shuting doors, the guard will give Kou a remote electric shock, killing the child in the process...

The game is split into "hours" instead of the regular "nights" becasue why would you wanna stay?

With hand drawn minigames and 2 unlockable modes, you wont be starving for content at Bondee's barnyard!
